meanings.definition: An enzyme found in pineapple juice that breaks down protein.
meanings.sent1: The bromelin in pineapple juice helps to break down proteins.
meanings.sent2: I learned that bromelin in pineapples can break down proteins.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled bromelin on the steak, making it super tender!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like bromelin, breaking down the tough exterior to reveal the truth.
meanings.sent5: The bromelin enzyme works like tiny scissors cutting through proteins.

meanings.definition: A substance derived from pineapple that is used in meat tenderizers.
meanings.sent1: The bromelin from pineapples is great for tenderizing meat.
meanings.sent2: My mom uses bromelin from pineapples to make the meat soft.
meanings.sent3: The bromelin sprinkled on the chicken made it so tender, it melted in my mouth!
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like bromelin, softening even the toughest hearts.
meanings.sent5: The bromelin substance from pineapples tenderizes meat like magic.

meanings.definition: A protein-digesting enzyme found in the stem and fruit of pineapples.
meanings.sent1: The bromelin enzyme in pineapples helps with digesting proteins.
meanings.sent2: Doctors say the bromelin in pineapples aids in protein digestion.
meanings.sent3: The bromelin in the pineapple did a little dance as it digested the proteins.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like bromelin, breaking down the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: Imagine tiny pacman-like bromelin enzymes gobbling up proteins in your stomach!
